title: I'm looking for Typefaces that look like a few of my favorite films from the 1970s
content:
I'm looking for Typefaces that look like the ones from the titles of a few of my favorite films from the 1970s.

Midnight Cowboy

[http://www.dvdbeaver.com/film/DVDReviews20/a%20John%20Schlesinger%20Midn...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201042236/http:/www.dvdbeaver.com/film/DVDReviews20/a%20John%20Schlesinger%20Midnight%20Cowboy%20Voight%20Hoffman%20DVD/title%20John%20Schlesinger%20Midnight%20Cowboy%20Voight%20Hoffman%20DVD%20.JPG "http://www.dvdbeaver.com/film/DVDReviews20/a%20John%20Schlesinger%20Midnight%20Cowboy%20Voight%20Hoffman%20DVD/title%20John%20Schlesinger%20Midnight%20Cowboy%20Voight%20Hoffman%20DVD%20.JPG")

Friends of Eddie Coyle

[http://www.dvdbeaver.com/film2/DVDReviews45/the%20friend%20of%20eddie%20...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201042236/http:/www.dvdbeaver.com/film2/DVDReviews45/the%20friend%20of%20eddie%20coyle%20criterion/title%20eddie%20coyle.JPG "http://www.dvdbeaver.com/film2/DVDReviews45/the%20friend%20of%20eddie%20coyle%20criterion/title%20eddie%20coyle.JPG")

The Long Goodbye

[http://www.dvdbeaver.com/FILM/DVDReviews21/a%20Robert%20Altman%20The%20L...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201042236/http:/www.dvdbeaver.com/FILM/DVDReviews21/a%20Robert%20Altman%20The%20Long%20Goodbye%20Elliott%20Gould/title%20Robert%20Altman%20The%20Long%20Goodbye%20Elliott%20Gould.jpg "http://www.dvdbeaver.com/FILM/DVDReviews21/a%20Robert%20Altman%20The%20Long%20Goodbye%20Elliott%20Gould/title%20Robert%20Altman%20The%20Long%20Goodbye%20Elliott%20Gould.jpg")
author: JedEye

comments.content:
Links no worky. Here are the images. Eddie Coyle is Franklin Gothic. Midnight Cowboy is similar to Binner but I know it's something else.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201042236im_/http:/typophile.com/files/midnight-cowboy_6415.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201042236im_/http:/typophile.com/files/eddie-coyle_6567.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201042236im_/http:/typophile.com/files/long-goodbye_4680.jpg)

That was very helpful! Thank you so much.

Any idea about The Long Goodbye?

grubsessions.blogspot.com

Midnight Cowboy looks a lot like Britannic Ultra, except with slightly rounded corners.  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/britannic-lt/ultra/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201042236/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/britannic-lt/ultra/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/britannic-lt/ultra/")

Cheers,

T

And "The Long Goodbye" is Blippo Bold.

(Thanks to Mike Yanega's Bauhaus Style fonts ID Guide :-)
"The Friends..." looks like a Franklin Gothic of sorts.

Thanks everybody. This made my day!

This seems like a very nice community. I don't know how much I'll be able to contribute, but I've already learned a lot from just lurking.

[www.grubsessions.blogspot.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201042236/http:/www.grubsessions.blogspot.com/ "www.grubsessions.blogspot.com")

What about this one from Klute?

[http://farm1.static.flickr.com/213/502098146\_13f9d73749.jpg?v=0](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201042236/http:/farm1.static.flickr.com/213/502098146_13f9d73749.jpg?v=0 "http://farm1.static.flickr.com/213/502098146\_13f9d73749.jpg?v=0")

[www.grubsessions.blogspot.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201042236/http:/www.grubsessions.blogspot.com/ "www.grubsessions.blogspot.com")

[Latin Wide](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201042236/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/castletype/latin-ct/).

You should start a new thread for a new ID.  
And you should start it in [the right forum](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201042236/http:/typophile.com/typeid).

Thanks, Jan. Sorry for the confusion. Still new here. Someone can lock this thread I suppose.

[www.grubsessions.blogspot.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201042236/http:/www.grubsessions.blogspot.com/ "www.grubsessions.blogspot.com")
